summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2504 for the improvement of Dearborn Street, from Rainier Avenue to Seventh Avenue South, all in the City of Seattle, by construction of sewers, side sewers and watermains, with their appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage, and fire protection of said district, and doing such other work as may be necessary in connection therewith under Ordinance No. 28437, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and fixing a date for the issuance of bonds.
